bioimg.base.load_image_series¶

bioimg.base.load_image_series(path, imgfiles, verbose=False)¶
Parameters
pathstring

Path with the image files

imgfileslist

List of image series filenames

verbosebool

If True print image shape

Returns
——-
imgarraynp.array

Image array of shape (N, X, Y) with N - number of images in the series
